version_name: 4.0 introduces a fresh new design for easier navigation
4.0.1 introduces a fresh new design for easier navigation

version_description: Bugs and stability fixes
Bugs and stability fixes
Bugs and stability fixes
Bugs and stability fixes
Bugs and stability fixes

* In countries where average speed camera zones are enforced, Waze now helps you drive safely within the speed limit and avoid speeding tickets. Get alerts where average speed cameras are located and track your progress as you drive through.
* Bugs and stability fixes
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
* Bugs and stability fixes
* Bugs and stability fixes
Bug fixes

* New and improved audio settings for better support for Bluetooth
* You can now change your desired arrival time in planned drives
* Improved support for iOS 10
* Bug fixes for gas prices and parking suggestions
* Other minor bug fixes

- Now, send reports about traffic, accidents and police even when your phone isn’t connected to a cellular network
- Never lose your parked car again. Easily find it by marking your parking spot on the map 
- Know ahead of time where you'll be turning. Tap on a specific turn in the Next Turns list to see it on the map
- Other minor bug fixes

- Search by voice update: Search for a street by speaking its name in the language of the country you’re in, even if your Waze is in another language
- Auto complete distance: See the distance to any location as you type it in the Search box, with new auto complete distance feature
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Search by category: Discover nearby parking, restaurants, hotels, shopping, and more without having to type exact names.
- Friends and Inbox have a new home: Now, see whether you have new inbox messages and Waze friends online in your Waze menu navigation list. If you do, tap to your My Waze screen to read them and see who’s there.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Search by category: Discover nearby parking, restaurants, hotels, shopping, and more without having to type exact names.
- Friends and Inbox have a new home: Now, see whether you have new inbox messages and Waze friends online in your Waze menu navigation list. If you do, tap to your My Waze screen to read them and see who’s there.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using Waze, where millions of drivers beat traffic every day with real-time help from other drivers. We’re constantly improving the app for you, so don’t forget to update the latest version for all of the available features. Here's what's new this week:
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using Waze, where 75 million drivers beat traffic every day with real-time help from other drivers. We’re constantly improving the app for you, so check out what's new this version:
- The Waze map has a new, improved design with more distinct highway labels and landmarks – making it simpler than ever to find your way.
- Know where you came from to know where you're going. Now, you can more easily understand U-turns and complicated intersections because Waze marks where you’ve already driven.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Thanks for using Waze, where 80 million drivers outsmart traffic with real-time road information. Waze is constantly improving, so check out what's new this version:
- Just tap and drive: The search bar is right on the map, so with a tap you can find a destination and start your navigation.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

You’re one of 85 million Wazers outsmarting traffic with real-time updates. See what’s new: 
- California, Waze Carpool is available statewide! Just pick up a fellow Wazer on your route and say “Goodbye traffic, hello fast lane!”
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using Waze! With every drive, you’re joining 85 million Wazers who save time by taking the fastest route. Here is what’s new:
- Flat tire? Request roadside help so Wazers around you can stop and lend a hand 
- Find out if a business is open or closed before you start driving
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Find out if a business is open or closed before you start driving
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- Minor bug fixes and improvements
Fixed a few bugs so it’s easier to save time & avoid traffic with Waze.
Fixed bugs and made a few tweaks so it’s easier to save time & avoid traffic with Waze.
Fixed some bugs so you can avoid traffic and get to your destination faster with Waze.

There are a bunch of new features in this update! See what’s included:
- Say “OK Waze” and use your voice to navigate, report traffic jams, and more - all hands-free.
- New routing option - HOV! Just add your pass or update your vehicle type (US & Canada only).
- It’s here! Waze now supports routing for motorcycles. Update your vehicle type and hit the road. 
- Waze is now optimized for iPhone X. 
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Happy holidays! Check out what’s new in this version:
- Waze now supports Weblink in-car entertainment system. Just plug in your phone & go.

Saving time & avoiding traffic is even easier now with these improvements:
- Fixed a bug that makes it easier to erase old messages from your Waze inbox
- Fixed a bug for some users where an image appeared askew on the ETA info screen
